title: Upcoming Features for My Personal Blog
content:
## Next Features for My Personal Blog

I've been thinking about what to add next to my personal blog, and here are the features I'm planning to work on:

## 🗓️ Publishing Date
I want to add a **publishing date** feature so that articles can have a scheduled release.  
This means:
- Before the publishing date, **guest users won't be able to access the article**.
- Great for writing posts in advance and releasing them later.

## 💬 Comment Feature
A **comment section** would be nice, so readers can interact with my posts.  
Planned features:
- Basic text comments.
- Option for logged-in users to reply.
- Maybe moderation tools later.

## 🏷️ Categories, Tags, and Search
Organizing content is important!  
I'll add:
- **Categories** to group similar articles.
- **Tags** for more detailed filtering.
- A **search bar** to quickly find content.

---

Which of these features should I prioritize first? 🤔  

Wait, you can’t comment, can you? Silly me 😂
